H0.text: name of volcano that erupted in iceland in 2010. Katla

H1.text: name of volcano that erupted in iceland in 2010. Hekla

H2.text: name of volcano that erupted in iceland in 2010. Grímsvötn

H3.text: name of volcano that erupted in iceland in 2010. Eyjafjallajökull

A4.text: The eruption begun on 20 March 2010, about 8 km (5 mi) east of the top crater of the volcano, on Fimmvörðuháls, the high neck between Eyjafjallajökull and the neighbouring icecap, Mýrdalsjökull.

A5.text: Katla did not display any unusual activity (such as expansion of the crust or seismic activity) during the 2010 eruptions of Eyjafjallajökull
